title: Verify: Implement FallbackPlanner Stub
description:
Run automated tests for task T-007.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Implement the FallbackPlanner as a stub module that supports safe fallback maneuvers (ask clarifying question, refuse politely, switch to text summary, escalate to human, offer to send email/link). Integrate with LaneArbitrator and Lane C for triggering fallback patterns.
Criteria:
- FallbackPlanner supports all specified fallback maneuvers as stub functions
- FallbackPlanner can be invoked by LaneArbitrator on policy cancel
- Fallback mode is configurable
- Fallback events are logged in AuditTrail
acceptance_criteria: FallbackPlanner supports all specified fallback maneuvers as stub functions
FallbackPlanner can be invoked by LaneArbitrator on policy cancel
Fallback events are logged in AuditTrail
